SMC Under PL 95-479
PL 95-479
, effective October 1, 1978
added a new subsection,
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(2)
redesignated the existing
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)
as
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(1)
, and
provided for the payment of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(2)
if a Veteran in receipt of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(1)
was entitled to a higher level of care.
Note
:Â  Entitlement under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(2)
while hospitalized at government expense was prohibited.
